metadata.title: CVE-2022-32741 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Attacker is able to determine if the provided username exists (and it'svalid) using Request New Password feature, based on the response time.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
